scripts.build: npm run build:move && cd client && npm run build
scripts.build:move: copyfiles UTTTLogic.js client/src && copyfiles UTTTLogic.js server/src
scripts.clean: concurrently "cd client && rimraf node_modules build" "cd server && rimraf node_modules" "npm run clean:movedfiles"
scripts.start: npm run build:move && concurrently "cd client && npm start" "cd server && npm start"
